longDescription: For clients seeking instant transformation, Dr. SNA uses premium body-formulated hyaluronic acid fillers to lift hip dips, define the upper pole, and smooth contour irregularities. Unlike implants, volume is sculpted layer by layer and can be refined or dissolved if preferences change.

title: Hyaluronic Acid Buttock Fillers

cta.title: See Your Curves Today
cta.subtitle: Book a dermal filler buttock consultation with Dr. SNA.

overview.title: What to Expect
overview.content: After 3D mapping we inject HA filler using blunt cannulas to avoid vessels. Volume is layered to sculpt upper, mid, and lower poles for symmetry. Because filler is hydrophilic, results remain soft and natural to the touch.

seo.metaTitle: Dermal Filler Buttock Augmentation London | Instant Non-Surgical BBL | Dr. SNA
seo.metaDescription: Achieve fuller curves immediately with high-density hyaluronic acid buttock fillers. Doctor-only injections, custom mapping, adjustable volume.
seo.h1: Dermal Filler Buttock Augmentation in London

schema.howPerformed: After 3D mapping your natural curves and marking injection points, we apply topical numbing and use blunt-tipped micro-cannulas to inject premium high-density hyaluronic acid filler. Working in layers, we carefully place filler into the subcutaneous fat and deep gluteal fascia—building volume in the upper pole for lift, filling hip dips for smoother contours, and enhancing the lower curve for projection. You watch progress in the mirror and give real-time feedback so we can sculpt to your exact vision. Cannulas minimize bruising and avoid blood vessels. Each syringe is placed with precision. The entire session takes 90 minutes
schema.preparation: Arrive in comfortable, loose clothing (joggers or loose dress work well). Avoid blood-thinning medications and supplements for one week. No alcohol 48 hours before. Eat a good meal beforehand. Bring photos of curves you admire for reference. Plan to avoid sitting directly on buttocks for 48 hours post-treatment (lie on sides or stand). Arrange transport home—you won't want to drive or sit in a car immediately after. Come with realistic expectations about volume and symmetry
schema.followup: Avoid sitting or lying directly on your buttocks for 48 hours to allow filler to integrate (sleep on your side or stomach). Use a special cushion with cut-out if you must sit. Avoid intense exercise, saunas, and hot baths for one week. Expect significant swelling and possible bruising for 5-10 days—this is normal. Wear loose clothing. Gentle walking encouraged from day one to promote circulation. Attend your 2-week review for assessment and any refinement injections. Final results visible once swelling subsides completely (2-4 weeks)
schema.outcome: Immediately after treatment, you'll see fuller, rounder curves with lifted upper poles and smoother hip transitions. Once swelling settles (2-4 weeks), contours look natural, soft to touch, and proportionate. You can wear form-fitting clothes with confidence. Results last 12-18 months as hyaluronic acid gradually metabolizes. Treatment is completely reversible with hyaluronidase if you ever want to change or reduce volume. Many patients return for maintenance top-ups yearly to preserve curves
schema.medicationRequired: Topical numbing cream. Local anesthetic mixed with filler for enhanced comfort
schema.treatmentFrequency: Single session for initial volume (4-12 syringes depending on goals). Maintenance top-up sessions every 12-18 months to preserve curves. Can be staged—start with 4 syringes, add more later
schema.adverseOutcome: Significant swelling and bruising for 5-10 days (expected). Temporary firmness or lumps that massage out. Asymmetry while swelling settles. Discomfort sitting for first 48 hours. Very rarely, vascular occlusion (we use cannulas and aspirate to minimize risk)

seriousAdverseOutcome.name: Vascular occlusion or fat embolism
seriousAdverseOutcome.probability: Extremely rare (less than 0.01%) when using proper cannula technique, anatomical knowledge, and aspiration protocols

contraindication: Active skin infection in buttock area
Severe allergies to hyaluronic acid (extremely rare)
BMI over 35 (filler may not provide enough volume—consider Lanluma or surgery)
typicalTest: Visual and manual assessment of buttock shape and proportions
3D body mapping and photography from multiple angles
Discussion of aesthetic goals and reference photos
Medical history including previous body procedures
clinicalFindings: Asymmetry from previous surgery or trauma
Volume loss from weight loss or aging
Desire for fuller, rounder curves without surgery

description: High-density HA fillers add immediate projection and shape to the buttocks or hips with precise cannula placement.

packages.description: 4 syringes for subtle hip dip correction.
packages.name: Contour Starter

hero.headline: Instant Curves, Tailored to You
hero.subheadline: Premium HA body fillers create projection and shape you see right away.

faq.question: How much filler do I need?
faq.answer: Ranges from 4 to 12 syringes depending on volume goals. We create a plan and can stage sessions.

faq.question: Is it safe?
faq.answer: We use cannulas, aspirate frequently, and keep hyaluronidase on hand for total control.
